original_text:
so that those who dwell at the ends of the earth are in awe at your signs.
You make the going out of the morning and the evening to shout for joy.
korean_text: 땅 끝에 사는 자가 주의 징조를 두려워하나이다 주께서 아침 되는 것과 저녁 되는 것을 즐거워하게 하시며

sentences.original_text: so that those who dwell at the ends of the earth
are in awe at your signs
You make the going out of the morning and the evening
